p:
In contrast to observations with GA, GS reduced the number of infections established by 70 ± 14%, with an IC 50 of 3 ± 1 nM due to its higher affinity for HSP90 (
29 ). Analysis of the single-cell data is presented in table S3. The impact of GS on the five phenomenological parameters was the same as observed for GA (fig. S4). In this case, it is clear that mechanistically identical compounds yield identical signatures at the single-cell level.
